LanguageData.SSLR.PowerSaveMode: Power saving mode(Click to change modes): Does not consume power when idle, outputs a lot of power when struck, but only has a {0}% chance to attract a lightning bolt and cools down {1}% slower
LanguageData.SSLR.NormalMode: Normal mode(Click to change modes): Consumes a bit of power when idle, outputs enough power to sustain itself in a storm and has a 100% chance to attract a lightning bolt. Can attract lightning at a {0}% chance when overwhelmed.
LanguageData.SSLR.FastMode: Fast cooldown mode(Click to change modes): Cools down 4x faster than normal but consumes triple the amount of power. Has a 100% chance to attract a lightning bolt. Can attract lightning at a {0}% chance when overwhelmed.
LanguageData.SSLR.CannotChangeMode: Cannot change mode now, rod still discharging.
